website_summaries.verdict: The poker set for anyone who needs a large number of chips.
pros: 11.5 gram clay composite chips in 7 colors
Denomination markings prevent the need to memorize values
Two decks of cards, five dice, and three dealer buttons included
Comes with 750 chips, making this a good choice for up to 10 players

customer_reviews.title: Great chips!  Junk case.
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead and gave it 4 stars but giving the quality of the case, I did consider, strongy, in dropping two stars. Everything but the case is pretty decent but the case is really bad. Do not lift it by the handle as the cheap plastic hinges will break. Be aware, this thing weighs ~30lbs. The chips are shrinked wrapped in bundles of ~25. A string in the rolls to help remove the plastic would be a marked improvement. Regardless, this will make family poker night much more enjoyable, replacing counting all those pennies.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great set of chips with comfortable weight and feel the case is garbage but still totally worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic chips, enough to go around even for a big poker game plus the cut cards and buttons. I like the feel and the weight of each chip, i just wish you didnt get so many low denominations which have a tendency to be useless in a bigger poker game. But this did come with plenty of high dollar chips too which somewhat solves this problem. Manufactureres just need to make less$1 and $5 chips and more $25 and $50 since thats where the game ends up rather quickly. The case for these chips is pretty terrible, overall. Its flimsy and the handle feels like it will break off at any moment other that that a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Jake and Mia

customer_reviews.title: Poker Nut Approved!!
customer_reviews.text: I have played a lot of poker, all over the US, and I was pleasantly pleased with these chips. I have a couple cases of the really high end clay chips, but wanted a set to take to the cigar shop's poker room, and be less worried about stuff happening - these not only met that need, but impressed me with their overall feel. I could shuffle them straight out of the plastic, and they didnt slip all over like some of the cheaper sets. Poker nut Approved!
customer_reviews.author: Seriously?

customer_reviews.title: Great set of chips!
customer_reviews.text: Great chips. No more remembering or explaining what color is what amount. Nice set for poker night. No issues with discoloration or markings that 8 have seen in reviews. Small blemishes, yes, but no affect on the chips. Stack fine, good feel and weight. I will order other denominations ($10 and $50) down the road. Dice, 2 cut cards and the 3 buttons (BB, SB, DEALER) are a great nice to have. Great set for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Received so many compliments! Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this because I hated memorizing color values and needed something heavy similar to the casinos. When I started hosting poker nights, the poker chipset received so many good compliments! The numbers helped a friend that was color blind and was less intimidating for new players. I can't complain much about these... It was well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: EVG

customer_reviews.title: Chips are great, The cast needs to be heavier because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Chips are great, The cast needs to be heavier because the legs were broken when we got the package. Chips are too heavy for the case. My husband loved the chips he said not to bother anyone about the case. So I did not report it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set of poker chips
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect sized set for 6-10 players. The chip weights feel good and the best part is the values printed on the chips. I can't tell you how many times I've had to re-explain chip values to players when using non-printed chips. This solves that problem entirely by including the face value on both sides. There are plenty of chips to go around too, so you can have high stakes or low stakes poker games. For someone looking to start a poker night once a week, this set does the job.
customer_reviews.author: spongebob05

customer_reviews.title: Case is cheap but the chips are fine.
customer_reviews.text: Case is very cheap, has a gap when it’s closed. The inside was done super cheaply. For the price, I guess it’s not too bad but I wouldn’t have paid for how it came, just hope the case doesn’t fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great chips. I am happy with these chips
customer_reviews.text: Great chips. I am happy with these chips. The case is alright too. My only complaint is it would be nice to choose the denomination of the chips. Like it would be great to have 250 $1, 250 $5, 250 $25. Since that would be the most common set up. So instead I just bought 3 orders of 50 $1
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Nice set but the tray that holds the chips and cards was constructed of cheap plastic that I guess got exposed to the cold snap and shattered. Expected a lot more for $70.00 dollars as it was bought by my sons to play with using their own money it was a BIG LET DOWN. Could not return it for exchange, refund only So I an going to build them trays that are good quality instead of crap. And NO I would not recommend this to a friend or enemy.
customer_reviews.author: TonyB

customer_reviews.title: Good product and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality at the reasonable price. I’ve seen complaints about the case but I haven’t had an issue These are genuine casino grade. Same size, material and weight
customer_reviews.author: C.Edward

customer_reviews.title: Case is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: This set is fine, but you will need a new case. The sides were bulging out on both sides, as soon as we pulled it from the box. have tried to reach seller, to send a new or better case, and have zero response back.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Crappy case
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with the quality of the chips in this set but the case is however crappy. When I pulled the case out of the packaging by the handle, it broke off and is now useless - the handle is made of cheap plastic. I read the other reviews on this quality of case but thought if I could treat it gingerly it wouldn't be an issue. I was wrong, and now I need to buy a different more durable case to transport the chips.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set. Bought it as a gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. Bought it as a gift for my neighbor since we moved so that they could continue our poker games. The values on the chips are great and high quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna Haley

customer_reviews.title: Good amateur set.
customer_reviews.text: The cards that come with it are worthless, but who cares. The chips are fine, unless you just have to have the feel of clay. These are plastic with metal inserts. Definitely do the trick for casual play, and everyone I've played with loves that they don't have to remember what color represents what amount.
customer_reviews.author: Apollinaire

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased about the product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased about the product. I received the Set of 750 Chips. in Excellent condition including the case set. for the price of $65 for home game poker, Excellent workmanship for the inlays, considering the price you pay. labor and materials alone is more than the price you pay. As for me, I am one happy customer. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for $ you spend. Case is garbage, but I’ll just be extra careful with it. Cards are your typical cheap playing cards. The value is in the amount of chips you get and they appear as if they’ll hold up a long time. Fairly certain I’ll like this set. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Dana K Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Chips weight.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Good quality chips. Interior of case could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, plenty of chips for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Chips are a good weight and the denominations are easily discernible. We use them as replacements for paper money in board games!
customer_reviews.author: gperson2

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the best value for getting poker chips.
customer_reviews.text: The chips are awesome. I think this is the best deal for getting chips. They have values printed on them which reduces ambiguity. The quantity and quality of the chips is fantastic. i could not be happier with the chips. Then there is the case... the insert inside the aluminum case is pure junk. it is cracked and breaking in many places.
customer_reviews.author: james carignan

customer_reviews.title: and the chips are great, but the case they come in is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: The cards are passable, and the chips are great, but the case they come in is rubbish. The handle is barely attached and wobbles and the locks are a nightmare to operate, other than that a fairly good set in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rance R.

customer_reviews.title: Good set except for the 2 cheap deck of cards
customer_reviews.text: The set is good but real heavy I guess it should be with so many chips but the 2 decks of cards that came with it is thin and cheap the 1st day using them they got bent up for the price it should at least come with good cards other than that it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: Antuan M Charley

customer_reviews.title: Premium Set of of 750 Casino Del Sol 11.5 gram Poker Chips w/Case
customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating as this set is very nice for the price. The only issue of note with this set is the handle on the case itself which has not presented any issues but feels cheap. The chips themselves are excellent. Would recommend this set as a good starter set for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect poker set for a awesome game night. I did a ton of research with a few different sets and found that this was the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Frost

customer_reviews.title: Chips are OK. When I got them had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Chips are OK. When I got them had to fix a number of them as they have stickers in the center for the dollar amount. Case is very very cheap especially the handle. Would not carry by the handle. Don't feel the value of the chips and especially the case is with the money. They will do for my weekly poker playing. Will see down the road how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Item did not come complete
customer_reviews.text: Minor dents on the case, but i expected as much. Chips are okay and exactly what you pay for. The item shipped incomplete and were missing the dice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Subido

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing chips, great weight. Case is a little flimsy, but that's not what I care about.
customer_reviews.author: Prabhakar

customer_reviews.title: nice...but......
customer_reviews.text: used for the first time tonight chip weight is nice, case is sturdy but handle...well I don't wann'a carry it by it; seems unsure. the chip #'s started to peel a bit and the cards were awful two the backing tore a bit had to throw away deck. but other than that. nice.
customer_reviews.author: overdone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The case is not very well made but for the money everything is above average
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed box.
customer_reviews.text: The box is very poorly constructed. Chips arrived and were missing 2 stacks. Didn't lock properly either.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: friends are impressed with the quality of chips as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a second time I purchased this item and unfortunately for both time it was damaged and I'm so unsatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Arash

customer_reviews.title: Nice poker chips...
customer_reviews.text: The chips are nice. Broke them in last night. The only thing I dont like is the case, it is not very sturdy for the amount of weight it carries. Other than that, nice set of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Travdude124

customer_reviews.title: Home run!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my brother, and he loved it!! Everyone thought it was the best set they ever saw.
customer_reviews.author: Willie M.

customer_reviews.title: This was a very good price for these chips
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good price for these chips. The carrying was slightly defective but for the price, wasn't that bad to make a return.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a great set other than the case
customer_reviews.text: Case came badly broken and a sleeve of chips was already opened. Seemed like a great set other than the case.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Z.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chips a awesome.... case is a bit flimsy for the weight of everything inside.
customer_reviews.author: K. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Chips are great
customer_reviews.text: Would have been five stars if the case and included cards had been higher quality
customer_reviews.author: Owen Kavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great poker chips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my parents, and they are great poker chips. They have a good weight and feel to them, and are good for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Hines, MD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks good, just gotta use them and host a game
customer_reviews.author: Arlyn Chesley

customer_reviews.title: Chips are awesome, case is frail
customer_reviews.text: The chips are awesome, I get alot of compliments for them. Unfortunately, they don't help me win any. The case is very cheap and will not hold up long, I highly recommend getting a new case.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Good Chips bad case
customer_reviews.text: The chips is OK, with good printing and good weight. They stack well too. The chips is not very clean so I clean them after I receive it. The part that I cannot accept is the case, it is seriously damaged to the extend that it cannot be used anymore, since I have to carry the chips around, it becomes a big trouble for me. It is really a buzzkill to see a set of good chips with a terrible case containing them.
customer_reviews.author: sky snob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for the biweekly tournament I run
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for the biweekly tournament I run. Had to order more 500 1000 and 5000 chips since we don't use the 1 or 5 chip and usually have two tables going. Recommend getting this for anyone serious about poker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the chips are great. the case came broken and the handle feels ...
customer_reviews.text: the chips are great. the case came broken and the handle feels like its about to rip off any second. I threw the cards away because they are the worst cards ive ever seen. overall I just bought the set for the chips. and im not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M Miller

customer_reviews.title: ORDER EXTRA 25 100 1000 CHIPS FOR TOURNAMENTS
customer_reviews.text: SWEET chips if your having tournaments i suggest buying more 25 100 500 n 1000 sleeves . As i was so short w those denominations. i had a 40 person tournament
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Coins are good. There are 749 chips and not 750
customer_reviews.text: Coins are good. There are 749 chips and not 750. Few chips of $500 has $100 printed on one side, Cards are ok to play. Cant carry case with its handle, need to hold the case with both hands and its very heavy too. I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pravin

customer_reviews.title: When the Chips are Down...
customer_reviews.text: The chips are excellent but the case is extremely flimsy; I am constantly afraid it will break under the weight of the chips. If you buy this, plan on getting a new case.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Henning

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal
customer_reviews.text: These feel good, the case is nice and the chips are the denominations I wanted. I believe I will enjoy the set.
customer_reviews.author: clyde

customer_reviews.title: Just bought the set and was very disappointed to see how cheaply made it was for $80
customer_reviews.text: Just bought the set and was very disappointed to see how cheaply made it was for $80. The inside was cracked and breaking and the case itself looked very cheaply made. This was a huge mistake buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good chips, Terrible Case
customer_reviews.text: The case's handle was already coming off when I received it. I don't plan to travel much with it, but if you do, then think about another case. Chips are great quality for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Ghan

customer_reviews.title: excellent chip set
customer_reviews.text: great value for the price, a very nice set of chips denominations are easy to read, great for tournament play
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for family poker nights
customer_reviews.text: The chips are awesome and the quality & quantity is excellent for the price! Everyone loved them! You can't find a better deal - 750 chips for $49.99!! with the case..
customer_reviews.author: Kiana Karin

customer_reviews.title: Great chips
customer_reviews.text: Great feel to chips, cards are very skimpy. Chips have that casino feel and sound. Big and small blind chips give your game that authentic feel.
customer_reviews.author: The Great 35

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chips!!! excelent product. Already using it playing some poker with friends. I have no complains on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael La Motte

customer_reviews.title: Quality chips for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Chips are casino quality! Great for poker nights with friends! I like that it comes with all the dealer and blind buttons, as well as dice, two cut cards, and two decks!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fiebiger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a good set of chips for casual neighborhood poker nights. I researched lots of different sets and finally bought this one based on the reviews. I am very pleased with the set overall. I don't think I could do much better for the price and 750 chips is about perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great set. I like that the chips have dollar ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set. I like that the chips have dollar amounts on them. Have friends that are color blind and had trouble with my previous set that had all color. Surprisingly heavy, be sure to bend your knees when lifting this case.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! Very high quality, great case, great product. Very happy with my purchase! Highly recommend this set for any poker player.
customer_reviews.author: Holly R Boice

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. Everything is sturdy, from the case, to the chips. Nice heavy feel to the chips and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Not enuff 1000's or 500's
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set ,, Love it ,, Wish I had more 1000 and 500's for some of the 5$ red ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought two sets of these, but i only needed one. This set has everything you need to have a poker game with about 6 or 8 people playing at home. Chips are the right weight and have the professional look to them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: The case is horrible!
customer_reviews.text: It's supposed to be brand new. The case had a dent and long scratch right on the top. The handle was missing a lot of the chrome paint. The case is by far the cheapest construction I've ever seen. The handle is made out of plastic and will surely break in the first couple uses. The case was so cheap that when I picked it up by the handle the center of the case flexed outward. The cards and chips (which were still wrapped) didn't even stay in their trays because it flexed so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Forsetir

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks a lot, good quality chips! Looks like the seller shows! Delivered on time. Recommend this set! 750 chips is really enough for 6 people. Now I can play Hold'em poker with my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Alexey E.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The set of Poker Chips is great. No problem; just very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I really thought it was more of a premium typ ...
customer_reviews.text: I really thought it was more of a premium typ of POker set. I mean everything was well packaged and all but well uhhhhhhh
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz Kaczynski

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the one i ordered was banned in our country In the middle east..
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Arce

product_meta.title: DA VINCI Set of of 750 Casino Del Sol 11.5 Gram Poker Chips with Case, Cards, Dealer Buttons and 2 Cut Cards
product_meta.description: Complete Texas Hold'em set for your poker nights and casino parties. This set of 750 Casino Del Sol chips features 11.5 gram chips with heavy duty aluminum case, 2 decks of playing cards, 3 dealer buttons as shown, and 2 cut cards. All chips have dollar denominations printed on them. Set includes: 150 Blue $1 chips, 200 Red $5 chips, 150 Green $25 chips, 100 Black $100 chips, 50 Gray $500 chips, 50 Orange $1,000 chips, and 50 Yellow $5,000 chips.
feature_bullets: 11.5 gram chips with the classy Casino Del Sol design
Set Includes aluminum case, 2 Decks of Playing Cards
3 poker dealer buttons and 2 cut cards included
Chips have dollar denominations printed on them
Set includes: 150 Blue chips, 200 Red chips, 150 Green chips, 100 Black chips, 50 Gray chips, 50 Orange chips, and 50 Yellow chips
